system.description:
Also at 4th level, at the end of another creature’s turn, you can use your reaction to activate a battle hymn. This battle hymn replaces any currently activated battle hymns. Replacing an activated battle hymn does not require expending a use of Bardic Inspiration if the previously activated hymn doesn’t have a target. In addition, choose one of the following.

  • Your battle hymns don’t require concentration.
  • Your battle hymns can affect a number of additional creatures equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum one).
  • You learn an additional battle hymn, which doesn’t count against the number of battle hymns you know. When choosing this battle hymn, treat your bard level as four higher for the purposes of meeting the hymn’s prerequisites. If you change this Battle Hymn Focus, you forget the additional battle hymn.

Whenever you gain a bard level, you can change your Battle Hymn Focus.
